text: Ifeanyichukwu Arthur Okowa (born on July 16, 1959), simply known as Ifeanyi Okowa is a Nigerian physician and politician. He is the former executive governor of Delta State and the vice-presidential candidate of the Peoples Democratic Party in the 2023 general election in Nigeria. He handed over power to Governor Sheriff Oborevwori. ==References== Category:Nigerian politicians Category:People from Delta State Category:1959 births Category:Nigerian physicians Category:Living people
title: Ifeanyi Okowa
